# interiorColor()

**Instance Method**

Gets the fill color used for drawing the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
func interiorColor() -> NSColor!
```

## Accessor methods

- **setInteriorColor(_:)**: Sets the fill color used for drawing the annotation.
